function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 within construction sites due to lack of safety protocols","Impact":"Risk of a major pandemic outbreak among construction workers, leading to serious health implications and project disruptions","Mitigation":"Implement strict occupational safety policies, such as social distancing and the mandatory wearing of N95 masks, and regular testing and tracing of infected individuals","Technologies":"Smart wearable devices for contact tracing, monitoring systems to ensure compliance with safety protocols","People":"Construction workers, site supervisors, project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, site supervisors, project managers"},{"Description":"Shutdown of construction sites due to COVID-19 outbreaks","Impact":"Disruption of project timelines, resulting in delays, financial losses, and contractual issues","Mitigation":"Develop and implement contingency plans for temporary shutdowns, and establish protocols for restarting construction after shutdowns","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and management systems for construction sites, virtual collaboration tools for project planning and management","People":"Project managers, construction companies, site supervisors","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in project continuity due to pandemic-related decision-making processes","Impact":"Increase in project suspensions, delays, and uncertainty about future construction activities, leading to financial losses and inefficiencies","Mitigation":"Develop multi-attribute utility choice models to capture risk preferences, and establish healthy coordination between public and private entities to identify opportunities for sustainable asset management","Technologies":"Data analytics and decision-making tools for risk assessment and project planning, communication platforms for collaboration between public and private entities","People":"Decision makers in the construction industry, public-private entities","Owner":"Construction companies, industry associations"}]}
